title: 820-01700 Power on but 2 ports not charging ,
message:
Macbook powers on and detects charger but top 2 ports won’t charge, both top ports get 5.15v 0.35a
Bottom ports get 20v, macbook powers on and seems to work perfectly it detects chargers on all ports but won’t charge  on top 2 ports, I’ve not had best luck with cd3217 issues so hoping it’s not the chips any suggestions,

title: 820-01700 Power on but 2 ports not charging ,
message: Don't you have schematic/boardview to reffer correctly the ports???

title: 820-01700 Power on but 2 ports not charging ,
message: On schematic just says j3300 im not seeing the actual port names  referring to store the top 2 on both sides, closest to power button connne Tor and cooler tobtiychbar connectors, I believe one goes to u3200 the other goes to ub300

title: 820-01700 Power on but 2 ports not charging ,
message:
Please, put some logic on your job!

Clicking on J3300 pins, you will find which ones go to U3100/200.
Find ones from the edge of connector; will help you to locate the USB-C ports easy.
Take pins 3 & 53 as example.

Do the same for JB500.

title: 820-01700 Power on but 2 ports not charging ,
message: that's what u thought, for some reason I thought u wanted different info, anyhow with that said affected ports are ub300 and  u3200, both detect charger, both not charging, ports u3100 and ub400 both get 20v and both charge, MacBook powers on normally, and passes all other hardware test

title: 820-01700 Power on but 2 ports not charging ,
message:
The corresponding CD3217 chips are first suspects.
Not easy to find good chips for 01700 board.
